special_text:
Whenever you activate a loyalty ability of Barten, the Seeking Scholar, exile the top two cards of your library.
[+1]: Put a card exiled with Barten into its owner’s hand, then discard a card.
[-2]: You may play cards exiled by Barten until your next turn.
[-5]: You get an emblem with “If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead.”
